import React, { useState , useEffect} from 'react' const WorkPiece = ({id,header,context,date,belongerId,handleDeleteWorkingPiece}) => { const[isVisible,setIsVisible] = useState(false); return (
setIsVisible(!isVisible)}>{header}
handleDeleteWorkingPiece(id,belongerId)} className="far fa-trash-alt" style = {{cursor:"pointer"}}>

{date}

{ isVisible ?

{}

{context}

: null }
) } export default WorkPiece;
